languages.text: "Астропат — специалист тончайшей подготовки, узревший свет самого Императора и обретший особую связь с нашим владыкой. Настоятельно советую Вольному Торговцу принимать на службу лишь санкционированных псайкеров, чей талант обуздан. Если таковых не хватает, Инквизиция поможет их отыскать... и добыть".

"The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."
languages.original_text: "Астропат — специалист тончайшей подготовки, узревший свет самого Императора и обретший особую связь с нашим владыкой. Настоятельно советую Вольному Торговцу принимать на службу лишь санкционированных псайкеров, чей талант обуздан. Если таковых не хватает, Инквизиция поможет их отыскать... и добыть".

traits.locale_text: "The Astropaths are the finest specialists of the finest training, who beheld the light of the Emperor himself and gained a special bond with our Overlord. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only the sanctioned psykers who can keep their talents in check. If there are not enough of them, the Inquisition will assist you in finding... and getting them."

"The Astropaths are the finest specialists of the finest training, who beheld the light of the Emperor himself and gained a special bond with our Overlord. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only the sanctioned psykers who can keep their talents in check. If there are not enough of them, the Inquisition will assist you in finding... and getting them."

If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

languages.text: “星语者是帝国中最为训练有素的灵能专家，他们亲眼目睹过帝皇本人的光芒，并与祂建立了特殊的联系。我强烈建议，行商浪人应当只招募那些能够控制力量的合法灵能者。如果数量实在不够的话，审判庭可以协助你找到更多星语者……并把他们带来。”
languages.original_text: "The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

traits.locale_text: “星语者是帝国中最为训练有素的灵能专家，他们亲眼目睹过帝皇本人的光芒，并与祂建立了特殊的联系。我强烈建议，行商浪人应当只招募那些能够控制力量的合法灵能者。如果数量实在不够的话，审判庭可以协助你找到更多星语者……并把他们带来。”

languages.text: «Los Astrópatas se encuentran entre los especialistas mejor entrenados del Imperium, que contemplaron la luz del mismísimo Emperador y adquirieron un vínculo especial con nuestro Maestro. Aconsejo encarecidamente {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente que reclute solo psíquicos autorizados que sean capaces de mantener sus habilidades bajo control. Si no hay suficientes, la Inquisición le ayudará a localizar... y contratar más».
languages.original_text: "The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

traits.locale_text: «Los Astrópatas se encuentran entre los especialistas mejor entrenados del Imperium, que contemplaron la luz del mismísimo Emperador y adquirieron un vínculo especial con nuestro Maestro. Aconsejo encarecidamente {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente que reclute solo psíquicos autorizados que sean capaces de mantener sus habilidades bajo control. Si no hay suficientes, la Inquisición le ayudará a localizar... y contratar más».

languages.text: 「感応通信官は帝国で最も厳しい訓練を受けたスペシャリストであり、皇帝自らの祝福を与えられ、我々のマスターとは特別な絆で結ばれている。ローグトレーダーには、己の能力を管理できる認定異能者のみを採用するよう強く忠告したい。数が足りないようなら、異端審問庁がそれらの者を探し出し、採用する手助けをしてくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

traits.locale_text: 「感応通信官は帝国で最も厳しい訓練を受けたスペシャリストであり、皇帝自らの祝福を与えられ、我々のマスターとは特別な絆で結ばれている。ローグトレーダーには、己の能力を管理できる認定異能者のみを採用するよう強く忠告したい。数が足りないようなら、異端審問庁がそれらの者を探し出し、採用する手助けをしてくれるだろう」

languages.text: « Les astropathes font partie des spécialistes les mieux entraînés de l'Imperium, ils ont contemplé la lumière de l'Empereur lui-même et y ont gagné un lien privilégié avec notre Maître à tous. Je ne saurais trop vous recommander de ne recruter que des psykers assermentés, capables de maîtriser leurs talents. S'il n'y en a pas suffisamment, l'Inquisition vous aidera à en repérer d'autres et à les... engager. »
languages.original_text: "The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."

traits.locale_text: « Les astropathes font partie des spécialistes les mieux entraînés de l'Imperium, ils ont contemplé la lumière de l'Empereur lui-même et y ont gagné un lien privilégié avec notre Maître à tous. Je ne saurais trop vous recommander de ne recruter que des psykers assermentés, capables de maîtriser leurs talents. S'il n'y en a pas suffisamment, l'Inquisition vous aidera à en repérer d'autres et à les... engager. »

languages.text: "Die Astropathen zählen zu den am besten ausgebildeten Spezialisten im Imperium. Sie haben das Licht des Imperators selbst gesehen und eine besondere Verbindung mit unserem Herrn aufgebaut. Ich rate {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} dringend, nur sanktionierte Psioniker zu rekrutieren, die in der Lage sind, ihre Fähigkeiten zu kontollieren. Wenn es nicht genügend sind, hilft die Inquisition Euch dabei, weitere zu finden ... und zu akquirieren."
languages.original_text: "The Astropaths are among the most finely trained specialists in the Imperium, who beheld the light of the Emperor Himself and gained a special bond with our Master. I strongly advise the Rogue Trader to recruit only sanctioned psykers who are capable of keeping their talents in check. If there are not enough, the Inquisition will assist you in locating... and acquiring more."
